column1: Little Goat Diner////The veggie burger was probably the best I've ever had. One kid had a burger with cheese
column2: he liked it. The other kid had the fish tostadas. Huge portion. The only downfall was the long wait. And not sure what was going on with the hostesses
column3: but quite a few parties ended up in front of us. Seems they need a better system for that. They had a lot of open seats
column4: but surely the kitchen could've handled it. Worth the visit for the food and super cute atmosphere. While you're waiting
column5: grab a drink in the bar.
